description: This quiche Lorraine dinner is one of the easiest you'll ever make. Simply toss crunchy apple with kale slaw while you bake the store-bought quiche.
name: Easy Quiche Lorraine With Apple Kaleslaw Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 Royal Gala apples, halved, cored, thinly sliced into wedges
170g Woolworths crusty baguette French stick, thinly sliced
0.25 bunch continental parsley, leaves picked, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Cook quiche according to packet instructions. Stand for 2 minutes, then transfer to a plate.
Meanwhile, prepare kaleslaw according to packet instructions. Add apple, then toss to combine. Season.
Spread butter over 1 side of each bread slice. Sprinkle parsley over quiche. Cut quiche into wedges and serve with slaw and bread.
